name: Bankruptcy
summary: This game was made for Ludum Dare 50. It's pretty tight.​Buy and sell properties for your inherited failing real estate business. You can’t stop it from going under, but perhaps you can delay the inevitable long enough to make yourself some real money! TIPS AND TRICKS: -Listing prices will fluctuate depending on Trends. Buy uptrending properties early to maximize profit, and avoid buying downtrending properties unless you can immediately sell them. -Properties in your inventory when the markets close will be sold for 80 percent of their Value automatically.
